imdb: Liam's emotions run the gamut when he sees Quinn unexpectedly for the first time since his escape. Quinn insists that their love story in the cabin was real and that they both have changed. She announces that she is willing to go jail just to prove her affection for Liam. Liam cannot believe his ears and simply orders Quinn out. Meanwhile, Steffy and Wyatt separately go to their respective fathers for advice about their current situation. Both Ridge and Bill encourage their children to work hard to make their marriage work.
